Nerangs.ab: haōməmca para.haōməmca āiiese yešti xšnūmaine zaraϑuštrahe bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi xšnūmaine tauua āϑrō bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe tā ānōh dō bār guftan bōy ham pad ān gyāg ī-m azabar nibišt ō ātaxš dādan

"xᵛarəϑəm miiazdəm āiiese yešti hauruuata amərətāta gāuš hudā̊ xšnūmaine sraōšahe -- he has to give bōy to the fire-- aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanumąϑrahe darši.draōš āhūiriiehe aōxtō.nāmanō. yazatahe haōməmca para.haōməmca āiiese yešti xšnūmaine zaraϑuštrahe -- he has to give bōy to the fire-- spitāmahe aṣ̌aōnō frauuaṣ̌ə̄e aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi xšnūmaine tauua āϑrō -- he has to give bōy to the fire-- ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe until here he has to say twice and he has to give bōy to the fire at the same passages I have writen above."
aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi xšnūmaine tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe dō bār guftan har bār bōy šaš bār ō ātaxš dahišn.
"He has to say twice aēsmą āiiese yešti baōiδi xšnūmaine tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe. Each time he has to give six times bōy to the fire."
